title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Design and develop AI applications using AI tools and cloud services. Apply Generative AI, deep learning, and image processing techniques while collaborating with cross-functional teams.
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field; proficiency in AI/ML tools and cloud services; strong problem-solving skills; effective collaboration abilities.

responsibilities: Design and develop applications utilizing AI tools and cloud AI services

Collaborate with cross-functional teams for integration and guidance
Stay updated with advancements in AI/ML and implement innovative solutions
